## StringEncodable

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/display/text-display.ts" sourceLine="6" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a type that can be encoded as a string.

```ts title="Signature"
type StringEncodable = string | number | boolean
```
